alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 1:37PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Little Bit of Freezing Rain Possible Late Christmas Day... Parts of south central Nebraska and north central Kansas, primarily for locations along and east of Highway 281, may be in line for a period of light freezing rain late Sunday afternoon and evening. Some light rain is expected mainly between 4 PM and 10 PM Sunday, but with temperatures around freezing or slightly below, some of that rain may freeze on contact. Untreated surfaces will be most susceptible to a light ice glaze. Bridges and other elevated surfaces will also be the first to freeze. Those with travel plans during the late afternoon and evening hours on Christmas Day may encounter some of this precipitation. This would include parts of Interstate 80, Highway 281, Highways 6 and 34, and Highways 24 and 36 among others. Give yourself some extra time to get to your destination and be prepared for winter driving condition due to the possible ice accumulation.
